sqlQuery.name: LongReadTranscriptAlias
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT lrt.talon_transcript_name || '_' || edsp.dataset_presenter_id as long_read_transcript_id , lrt.talon_transcript_name || '_' || edsp.dataset_presenter_id as old_long_read_transcript_id FROM apidb.longreadtranscript lrt , apidbtuning.externaldbdatasetpresenter edsp WHERE edsp.external_database_release_id = lrt.external_database_release_id

sqlQuery.name: Bfmv
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT lrt.gene_source_id , lrt.transcript_source_id , lrt.talon_transcript_name || '_' || edsp.dataset_presenter_id as long_read_transcript_id , lrt.number_of_exon , lrt.transcript_length , lrt.gene_novelty , lrt.transcript_novelty , lrt.incomplete_splice_match_type , lrt.min_start , lrt.max_end , lrt.na_seq_source_id FROM apidb.longreadtranscript lrt , apidbtuning.externaldbdatasetpresenter edsp WHERE edsp.external_database_release_id = lrt.external_database_release_id
